text: Thrisandhya is a 1972 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Raj Marbros, starring PK Abraham and Waheeda Rahman in the lead roles. ==Cast== * PK Abraham * Waheeda Rahman * H Suliamaan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1972 films Category:Indian films Category:1970s Malayalam-language films
title: Thrisandhya (film)
